>>The total fertility rate (TFR) of countries with a vertical (column) age-structure diagram is around:<< () 1.5 (x) 2.1 () 3.4 () 5.0
[explanation] A vertical (column) age structure diagram indicates that a population is stable--that is, it is neither increasing nor decreasing. Therefore, the total fertility rate of that population must be at the replacement level fertility, which is approximately 2.1. [explanation]
